title: CO2 emissions : Canada 1995 to 2018
summary: In general Emissions in million metric tons has stayed the same over the Year.

Emissions in million metric tons is slightly increasing from 1998 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2006, slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, and finally roughly increasing from 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Emissions in million metric tons, about 594.73 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Emissions in million metric tons about 533.1 was reached at Year 1998
